legal_compliance_rules.title: Disclaimers required for product claims
legal_compliance_rules.description: All performance, efficiency, or safety claims must have visible disclaimers
legal_compliance_rules.remediation: Add appropriate disclaimers near product claims

legal_compliance_rules.title: Vehicle shown disclaimer required
legal_compliance_rules.description: Images of vehicles must include 'Vehicle shown with optional equipment' disclaimer
legal_compliance_rules.remediation: Add vehicle disclaimer to image captions

legal_compliance_rules.title: Pricing must include disclaimers
legal_compliance_rules.description: Any pricing information must include MSRP disclaimer

legal_compliance_rules.title: Warranty information must be accurate
legal_compliance_rules.description: Warranty claims must match official Toyota warranty terms
legal_compliance_rules.remediation: Correct warranty information to match official terms
